About

This is 3D Modeling and Animation, I started doing 3D modeling and 3D animation back in 2019 when I was in Grade 12 or Senior High School. We had an Animation subject at the time, and we were assigned various projects. From 2020 to 2024, I continued working on 3D modeling because it became my hobby, and I also used it for college activities.
